tasks.label: build-and-deploy
tasks.command: git checkout main && git pull && rm -rf gh-pages && mkdir -p gh-pages && cp -f index.html assets/* gh-pages/ && git checkout gh-pages && rm -f *.html *.js *.css && mv gh-pages/* . && rm -rf gh-pages && git add . && git commit -m "Deploy: Updated site with latest changes" && git push origin gh-pages && git checkout main
